definition: proof/certificate/identification/testimonial/CL:個|个[ge4]/to prove/to testify/to confirm the truth of
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

pinyin: wai4 guo2 ren2 ju1 zhu4 zheng4 ming2
xuan1 shi4 gong4 ci2 zheng4 ming2

definition: probative value/strength of evidence in legal proof/relevance

sentences.english: As soon as you prove to be good, you will get more followers.
sentences.chinese: 如果事實證明你還不錯，必定會有更多追隨者。

sentences.english: Nathan noted that the study can't prove that smoking causes diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 內森說此項研究不能證明吸菸會導致糖尿病。

sentences.english: It turns out that you can be a committed nurse and have a social life.
sentences.chinese: 因爲那可以證明你可以是個有社交生活的帶罪護士。

sentences.english: Eco-fashion has certainly proved that it has enough caché in the fashion world.
sentences.chinese: 生態時裝還證明它在時尚界有着足夠的影響力。

sentences.english: So you testify against yourselves that you are the descendants of those who murdered the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 這就是你們自己證明，是殺害先知者的子孫了。

sentences.english: Endoscopic ultrasonography and computerized tomography demonstrated the lesion to be a cyst in nature.
sentences.chinese: 內視鏡超音波與電腦斷層檢查也證明此病竈爲囊狀物。

sentences.english: The relics left by the aztecs bespeak a high degree of civilization.
sentences.chinese: 阿茲提克族人的遺蹟證明其擁有高度文明。

sentences.english: Also nobody proof, the child does not recognize the father, the county magistrate worried for a while.
sentences.chinese: 既沒有人證明，孩子也不認爹，縣官一時犯了難。

sentences.english: My acquaintance confirmed that his fellow postmen were neither terribly nice nor terribly nasty.
sentences.chinese: 我這位熟人證明，他的同事們既不太好，也不太差。

sentences.english: And so, this actually is the input we needed to justify our criterion.
sentences.chinese: 這實際上是證明準則所需要的。

sentences.english: This study demonstrated A. pseudoalhagi extract has no significant side effects on rats.
sentences.chinese: 本研究證明駱駝刺提取物對大鼠無明顯毒副作用。

sentences.english: It is shown that the SOR method is convergent if the over relaxation parameter is properly chosen.
sentences.chinese: 證明了在適當的選取松馳因子，SOR方法是收斂的。

sentences.english: Finally a word on Burnley, did last night prove they will be no pushovers this season?
sentences.chinese: 最後說說伯恩利，昨晚證明他們本賽季能夠保級嗎？

sentences.english: But this is still difficult to prove.
sentences.chinese: 但是這仍然是很難證明的。

sentences.english: The treatment proved to be successful.
sentences.chinese: 這種療法證明是成功的。

sentences.english: In flush times, the convenience of buying a bottle of water seemed to justify its $1-plus price.
sentences.chinese: 購買了一瓶水的方便似乎證明了其1美元以上的價格。

definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to inspect and verify/experimental verification/to validate (a theory)/to authenticate
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
